text: Need Grace Young for IKEA campaign. Budget around $8,822, looking for 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Facebook post, 1 x Meet and greet, 2 x Instagram reel. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
